title: Open with blank page not working
content: Have just installed TB for the first time (replacing WLM) and am very happy with it. My only problem is that the option to open with a blank page is not working despite leaving the checkbox unchecked. I've tried checking and unchecking but it makes no difference, it always opens with the full setup options displayed. Is there another way to have TB open with a blank page?

title: Setting up 2nd Outlook account email in Thunderbird
content:
I have two Outlook accounts on my computer, each with its own outlook email address. I set up the first one a few weeks ago and works fine. I has all the subfolders that are also in Outlook --- Sent, Deleted, Drafts, Junk, etc. I may have had to set these up in Account Settings - Copies & Folders settings. I set up my second Outlook email account (not alias) in Thunderbird, but it only shows an Inbox subfolder. Sent emails from this second outlook account are going to Local - Sent subfolder. I can't set up a Sent folder. When viewing on Outlook, all subfolders are showing and Sent emails are being placed in the Sent folder under this second email account. Each outlook account has its own password.

What do I need to do to get the second outlook account in Thunderbird work with its own subfolders (Sent, Deleted, Drafts, etc) instead of using the Local subfolders?

Thank you
creator: rjameson1

title: On my win 11 laptop Icloud emails are not loading /listing properly onto Thunderbird to display them
content:
Account appears correct in the settings which has been checked through on line by Microsoft and Apple who suggest its a software issue with Thunderbird. Has anyone any thoughts as to the problem?

Microsoft analysis showed these comments:- "The request time out means your account has server issue which you temporarily cannot yet set up your account in thunderbird. With this, I would highly suggest contacting Apple Support so they can provide to you the correct information and when the server issue will be rectified for your account"

Apple support basically added nothing and suggested I contact Thunderbird Support.
creator: geminis9

title: un profilo da stamattina non invia più mail
content:
Buongiorno, sul mio pc da anni ho diversi indirizzi email di thunderbird, ma da stamattina improvvisamente uno non invia più le mail. Ho provato a fare tutte le manovre proposte, ma senza esito, così come ho controllato i dati, che sono sempre gli stessi. Il messaggio che mi compare è il seguente:

Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: <ordini@ecotorino.it> W9BPugTy50WuxW9BPuFAbu - Mittente non consentito / Sender not allowed ( mail from ). Verificare l’indirizzo email nelle impostazioni dell’account e riprovare.

Potete aiutarmi a risolvere il problema, per favore? Grazie anticipatamente Giorgio
creator: grg0401
